A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I am a socially liberal person. I saw Star Wars seven times in my youth. With The Last Jedi\, Disney has lost me. 

I don't go to Star Wars movies for political indoctrination. I go to be entertained by fun\, gritty stories of good and evil played out on a galactic stage. Seeing powerful\, complex characters reduced to simpering charicatures is not fun.

The progressive ideology is pervasive throughout the film and is frankly oppressive. It is unnecessary - progressives don't need Star Wars movies to advance their cause. And it is a betrayal to the film's brilliant and apolitical craftsmanship.

It will take an awful lot of convincing before I pay to see another Star Wars movie.
